ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Question on Loot and Classes
ygData.msgSnippet: The Fangs are indeed droppable and they generally go for around 1.5 - 2 k p. But I don t think that he has intentions of selling it. (If he does, I ll kill
ygData.messageBody:
The Fangs are indeed droppable and they generally go for around 1.5 - 2 k p.
But I don't think that he has intentions of selling it. (If he does, I'll
kill him.) He said that he would actually use. (Why is beyond me, highest
I've played a rogue to is level 5)

I'm gonna try a different tactic tonight. I'll calmly explain that if I had
the EBW it would not leave my hand until I was wielding planar loot. If he
can't say the same thing, but still insists on rolling then I may have to
kill him.

Draelon


-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 05, 2000 11:23 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Question on Loot and Classes


I was wondering why the rogue would think he needed the EBW as well. Since
its No drop he can't sell it. My rogue used 1 HS weapons for completeness,
but only until he got Backstab. Since then I don't think I've even touched
the FS Scimitar in the bank. Very odd. Are the fangs not No Drop as well?

Kit
